description: CSS file defining styles for a food delivery platform's frontend, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the food delivery platform's application, styled for both light and dark themes.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo with animation for spinning effect.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, aligned to center with specific styling for colors and layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, with transition effects on color change.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with proper styling and hover effects.
